fields.name: Named Juvenile Casebook (C1)
fields.value:
For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for Heartstopper Strike.
This effect can be triggered once every 10s.

fields.name: Investigative Collection (C2)
fields.value: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by Windmuster Kick is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.

fields.name: Esoteric Puzzle Book (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Heartstopper Strike by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Tome of Lies (C4)
fields.value:
The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each Windmuster Kick will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that Windmuster Kick will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One Windmuster Kick can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.

fields.name: Secret Archive (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Windmuster Kick by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Curious Casefiles (C6)
fields.value: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the Heartstopper Strike unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this Heartstopper Strike's CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.
